Thomas Anish Sutherland Kate D. http://orcid.org/0000-0002-7453-3366 Park Kwon-Sik http://orcid.org/0000-0003-3346-9086 24 5 2025 497784 2025.05.21.655382 29 09 2025 30 09 2025 01 10 2025 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/ This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License http://biorxiv.org/lookup/doi/10.1101/2025.05.21.655382 nihpp-2025.05.21.655382.pdf Abstract SMARCA4 and other components of the SWI/SNF chromatin remodeling complex have been implicated in various cancers. Yet, its role in small cell lung cancer (SCLC) tumorigenesis remains poorly understood.
